name: Flock (JordanGrayson)
description:
This is a short original game by Jordan Grayson with a given prompt of "Goodbye." I was inspired by the idea of a flock slowly dropping away and thinning and I thought it would be fun to implement a boids algorithm in Pico-8. This game was created during a one week period in Pico-8. I hope you enjoy!

Author

The game design, art, programming, and sound effects for Flock were made by Jordan Grayson. The music was inspired by Robby Duguay but made by Jordan Grayson.
